module.name: skrill
module.description: Mit Millionen von treuen Kunden weltweit deckt Skrill den Bedarf von über 156
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mit Millionen von treuen Kunden weltweit deckt Skrill den Bedarf von über 156.000 Unternehmen rund um den Globus und bietet ihnen damit eine Möglichkeit, Geld auf bequeme und sichere Art in fast 200 Ländern und 40 Währungen zu senden und zu empfangen.
module.additional_description: Schnelle und kostenlose EinrichtungZugang zu mehr als 100 lokalen Zahlungslösungen mit 1 einfachen IntegrationVerbindung zu über 30 Millionen Skrill-KontoinhabernHöchste Sicherheitsstandards und BetrugsschutztechnikNahtloses Zahlungserlebnis auf Handy, Tablet und Computer

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : DAS All-in-One Plug-in für Ihre E-Mails & SMS (Marketing und SMTP)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue : DAS All-in-One Plug-in für Ihre E-Mails & SMS (Marketing und SMTP). Synchronisieren Sie Ihre Prestashop-Kontakte zu SendinBlue, erstellen Sie einfach schöne E-Mail Kampagnen und kommunizieren mit Ihren Kunden und potenziellen Kunden.
module.additional_description: SendinBlue ermöglicht :Eine automatische Synchronisierung Ihrer Kontakte zu SendinBlue, die Verfolgung Ihrer TransaktionenDen Versand von schönen Newsletters.Eine optimierte Zustellbarkeit Ihrer Transaktions email im Posteingang (Anmeldung und Auftragsbestätigung usw.)Eine Verfolgung Ihrer Kampagnenberichte in EchtzeitEinen dedizierten Kundenservice per Telefon und E-MailSehen Sie sich unser Tutorial an : https://resources.sendinblue.com/de/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: pscleaner
module.description: Since your business keeps evolving all the time, PrestaShop helps you remove your catalog, orders and customers data in one go
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Since your business keeps evolving all the time, PrestaShop helps you remove your catalog, orders and customers data in one go.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to delete databases in one click: it helps clean your store and its data by allowing you the suppression of all data.

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.description_full: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules.

module.description_full: Enrich the ‘Stats’ section of your back office, display the pages requested by your visitors that could not be found.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Prevent technical issue: people attempting to access pages of your catalog but could not find them, resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors, can be useful to detect potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Try a free live chat with visitor recording Smartsupp is a combination of live chat and visitor recording, making it the only tool you’ll need to get to understand your visitors. With Smartsupp you can chat with visitors in real-time and also watch their behavior on your website. Know everything about your visitors The Smartsupp plugin lets you identify details of your visitors, like their name, email, or other categories you deem important. You can see all these details while chatting with that visitor so that you know who you’re chatting with (e.g., Tom Smith, who already spent $800 on your website). The visitor has to be signed in on your website for you to be able to see the info. Chat with your visitors in real time Smartsupp allows you to help your visitors as soon as they need assistance. You’re able to answer their questions instantly in the on-site chat box. If you notice similar situations arising, create and use canned replies and automatic messages to save time. With this fully customizable, multi-language live chat, you can increase your sales up to five times. Record the screens of your visitors Watch video recordings of any visitor on your website in the Smartsupp dashboard. You’ll see their screen, mouse movements, and clicks — great for understanding the behavior of your customers. The powerful combination of live chat and visitor recordings lets you know customers’ needs even before they make a final decision. Smartsupp helps you keep them on the right track.

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment. Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment. Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution. Use Emails, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Facebook Ads to convert more than 20% of lost customers into sales.
module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Facebook Messenger and SMS.Convert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 14 days, no credit card needed.  Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Connect with your customers and reassure them by highlighting your services: secure payment, free shipping, returns, etc
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Connect with your customers and reassure them by highlighting your services: secure payment, free shipping, returns, etc.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing in your online shop.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Add a banner to the homepage of your store to highlight your sales and new products in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add a banner to the homepage of your store to highlight your sales and new products in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like shopping your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Help visualize the navigation on your store, show your visitors the current category and subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help visualize the navigation on your store, show your visitors the current category and subcategories.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:​Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop and see available subcategories.Picture the category tree: it is very useful to navigate between category and subcategory pages.Facilitate the search: help your visitors to easily find the items they want. Indeed, they just have to look at the right place, and they will spot it quickly!

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Let your customers know where to reach you, add contact information in the header and footer of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Let your customers know where to reach you, add contact information in the header and footer of your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Be available: your customers will love to know when and how they can join you, it is always useful!

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in by enabling this link to appear on your front office
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in by enabling this link to appear on your front office.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to connect with your customers: create an easy purchasing environment for your clients to make them feel like going back.

module.name: ps_categoryproducts
module.description: Enhance your business, add a block on every product page that displays items from the same category
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Enhance your business, add a block on every product page that displays items from the same category.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you offer your customers matching products, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_productinfo
module.description: Create lively product pages with an animated tooltip block on each product page of your store that displays information about your sales
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Create lively product pages with an animated tooltip block on each product page of your store that displays information about your sales.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Get data in one glance: your visitors just have to land on a product page to have a quick look at the last sales regarding this product.Analyze your traffic: know where your visitors stop and what how many items have been purchased.

module.name: ps_cashondelivery
module.description: Accept payments on delivery, by cash, to make it easy for your customers to purchase on your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept payments on delivery, by cash, to make it easy for your customers to purchase on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Facilitate shopping: create a flexible purchasing environment for your clients, allow to make them feel like going back.Allow anyone to buy your products: accepting cash on delivery help customers without a credit card to purchase your items.

module.name: ps_rssfeed
module.description: Display the RSS feed of your choice on your shop and keep your pages dynamic; an active store is a store that retains attention!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display the RSS feed of your choice on your shop and keep your pages dynamic; an active store is a store that retains attention!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Catch your customers’ attention: you can let them have a glance at the RSS feed of your choice.Increase traffic: get traffic, other websites will be able to display your new products on their page.Promote your pages: display a link to your latest blog posts directly in your shop - or to any other content you deem suitable!

module.name: ps_brandlist
module.description: Highlight the brands whose items can be purchased on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by brand
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Highlight the brands whose items can be purchased on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by brand.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display in one-click all the brands available and optimize the user experience.Increase your visibility: highlight the brands you sell on your shop and focus on your SEO to gain traffic.

module.name: ps_supplierlist
module.description: Highlight the suppliers available to complete purchases on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by supplier
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Highlight the suppliers available to complete purchases on your store, add a list to your catalog and allow your visitors to filter their search by supplier.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display in one-click all the suppliers available and optimize the user experience.Increase your visibility: highlight your suppliers on your shop and focus on your SEO to gain traffic.

module.name: ps_viewedproduct
module.description: Give inspiration to your visitors, display a kind of showcase on your product pages with the recently viewed products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give inspiration to your visitors, display a kind of showcase on your product pages with the recently viewed products.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you recall to your visitors what items they last viewed, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display recently viewed products via this immediate, one-click access and optimize the user experience.

module.name: ps_crossselling
module.description: Foster your activity, offer your customers the possibility to buy matching items when on a product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Foster your activity, offer your customers the possibility to buy matching items when on a product page.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: your business remains on the alert when you offer your customers matching products, it will stimulate their shopping.Promote your catalog: because your products need special attention, display related products via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items.

module.name: ps_dataprivacy
module.description: Reassure your customers about the use of their data, display a short notice in the customer form to let them know that you care about privacy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Reassure your customers about the use of their data, display a short notice in the customer form to let them know that you care about privacy.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ensure the transparency of your business: give reassurance by displaying a small block in the customer account creation form.Reinforce trust: tell your customers what you do (and don’t) with their private data - you can trust us, it will be much appreciated!Boost your sales: a client who feels confident will be more likely to come back shopping in your store.Address specific customers: you can create specific contents depending on the language.

module.name: ps_feeder
module.description: Stay close to your visitors, add an RSS link inside your pages so that they can subscribe to this feed and get regular updates about your catalog
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Stay close to your visitors, add an RSS link inside your pages so that they can subscribe to this feed and get regular updates about your catalog.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: send regular updates to loyal customers by adding this feed to their own feed reader, without the need to subscribe to your newsletter.Improve your SEO: search engines may use it to discover your new content.Increase your visibility: get traffic, other websites will be able to display your new products on their page.

module.name: ps_reminder
module.description: Offer your customers a quick follow-up to bring them back on your store, create daily customized e-mails to send and keep in touch easily
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Offer your customers a quick follow-up to bring them back on your store, create daily customized e-mails to send and keep in touch easily.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled carts.Reward your customers: send vouchers when they reach a given amount of orders, validate their first order or to make them come back on your store!

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers.
module.additional_description: WorldFirst help you make international money transfers quickly, securely and at fantastic exchange rates, which could save you money compared to your bank or online marketplace. So if you need to pay overseas suppliers or repatriate earnings from international marketplaces like Amazon, Newegg or Cdiscount, WorldFirst can help. Click the button in the panel to register your interest with WorldFirst and a member of their team will be in touch to discuss opening an account. Please note this service is available in English, French, Dutch, Chinese and Japanese.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Passen Sie die Gestaltung Ihrer Mails dem visuellen Erscheinungsbild Ihrer Website, Ihrer Tätigkeit oder der Jahreszeit an – mit dem vorinstallierten Modul E-Mail-Vorlagen-Manager, welches
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Passen Sie die Gestaltung Ihrer Mails dem visuellen Erscheinungsbild Ihrer Website, Ihrer Tätigkeit oder der Jahreszeit an – mit dem vorinstallierten Modul E-Mail-Vorlagen-Manager, welches standardmäßig im Backoffice Ihres Shops vorhanden ist! Dieses kostenlose Modul ermöglicht es Ihnen, Ihre Modelle für Transaktionsmails wie die Anmelde- oder Auftragsbestätigung auf einfachem Wege zu ändern, ohne einen Designer hinzuzuziehen.
module.additional_description: Das Modul dient der Installation und Verwaltung der E-Mail-Vorlagen. Sie können damit Ihre verschiedenen Modelle austauschen oder verändern und Ihre Konfigurationen speichern. Entsprechend dem vom Entwickler vorgesehenen Design und Grad der Personalisierung sind Ihre Vorlagen an Kundenbedürfnisse anpassbar und bieten Ihnen folgende Möglichkeiten:  Änderung der Hauptfarbe sowie der sonstigen Farben der MailsAuswahl der Schriftart für den TextHinzufügen von Links zu Ihren sozialen Netzwerken und Änderung der entsprechenden LogosEinfügen von Bildern und zusätzlichem Text Mit diesem Tool können Sie außerdem eine Sicherungskopie Ihrer Transaktionsmails und des standardmäßigen PrestaShop-Designs erstellen. Und schließlich bleibt es Ihnen erspart, Inhalte Ihrer Mails zu schreiben oder zu übersetzen. Das Modul überträgt die verfügbaren Übersetzungen der Transaktionsmails direkt standardmäßig in PrestaShop!

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Carglass, TESA, bugatti, DHL und REWE  erstellen & versenden ihre Newsletter mit CleverReach®. Warum? Weil es einfach einfach ist
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Carglass, TESA, bugatti, DHL und REWE  erstellen & versenden ihre Newsletter mit CleverReach®. Warum? Weil es einfach einfach ist. Profitieren Sie mit Ihrem PrestaShop von unserer Software & flexiblen Preisen ohne Vertragslaufzeit.
module.additional_description: Das Modul verbindet unser CleverReach® E-Mail-Marketing Tool direkt mit Ihrem PrestaShop. Sofort werden laufend ganz automatisch alle wichtigen „PrestaShop-Daten“ im CleverReach® Newslettertool aktualisiert und ergänzt. Durch die Synchronisation sparen Sie wertvolle Zeit und Nerven. Gleichzeitig vermeiden Sie Fehler, die bei manuellen Im- und Exports häufig auftreten. Diese PrestaShop-Daten werden synchronisiert: Newsletter-Anmeldungen und -AbmeldungenVorname, Nachname, Interesse, Geschlecht, Alter, Geburtstag, Adressdaten...gekaufte Produkte, Umsätze, Häufigkeit der Käufe, durchschnittlicher Warenkorb, Bestellnummer, Artikelnummer, Produktname, Preis, Währung, Menge…Produktinformationen Ihrer PrestaShop-Artikel wie Bild, Text, Preis, Größen, Material…Weil einfach einfach einfach ist Nutzen Sie diese hilfreichen Daten für persönliche Angebote, die Ihre Kunden wirklich interessieren. Sie profitieren von mehr Öffnungen, mehr Klicks und mehr Conversions!Dies ist Ihr Schlüssel zu einfach mehr Umsatz: Ihre Kunden kaufen mehr und häufiger – einfach Gewinn. Gewinn. Gewinn.  Jetzt oben rechts auf „Herunterladen/Download“ klicken, das Modul downloaden und ohne viel Aufwand im PrestaShop-Backend installieren.  Danach können Sie Ihren PrestaShop schnell und einfach mit CleverReach® verbinden, Ihre Shopdaten synchronisieren und die erste E-Mail erstellen und versenden. Mit mehr als 190.000 Kunden, z.B. Spotify, Carglass, TESA, DHL und REWE, ist CleverReach® in 152 Ländern Lösungsanbieter für E-Mail-Marketing. CleverReach® wurde 2007 in Deutschland gegründet und erfüllt höchste Datenschutz-Standards. Exklusiv für PrestaShop-Kunden: 12 Monate 10% Neukunden-Preisvorteil auf Ihren CleverReach®-Tarif sichern!Einfach einfach: wird bei Neu-Account-Erstellung automatisch für Sie hinterlegt.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Protect uses industry-leading techniques in behavioral analytics, real-time user scoring, and global monitoring to identify bots and other malicious activity in your storefront. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Protect is designed to help your store fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Revenue Killer #1: Order FraudNS8 Protect scores every visitor to your storefront. Every action taken by the visitor leading up to and including placing an order is scored individually and reflected in the EQ8 Score. Low-scoring orders are most likely fraudulent and may be held or flagged for manual review. NS8 Protect also provides automated tools to escalate suspect orders or even request e-mail and SMS text verification from the visitor. The mix of automated tools and easier manual reviews empowers merchants to optimize their order processing and minimize risk. Benefit from the network of stores and websites already tagging fraudulent users and suspicious behavior by using NS8 software.Reduce costly chargebacks and the risk they pose to your merchant account.Reduce both the labor dedicated to manual review and shipping lead times.Set your own custom threshold for suspect orders and users. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. NS8 Protect not only scores all traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising sources are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results. Compare scored campaigns for the presence of bot traffic and fraud.Prevent bots and fraudulent users from being tagged for remarketing.Integrate with Google Analytics to tag high-value users for more effective remarketing.Track your store’s advertising savings from blocked fraudulent users. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Protect includes 5 critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have. If and when an issue arises, escalating text messages are sent to you and your staff warning of potential or actual problems. Monitor your store’s technical performance. If your store becomes slow or unresponsive due to plugin conflicts or other changes, you will be immediately notified.Monitor your store’s global performance relative to other eCommerce stores.Monitor your store’s encryption certificates. If your store’s certificate expires, users will be warned against using your service. NS8 will alert you first, before the all-important certificate expires.Monitor spam and malware blacklists for your store’s domain. If your store finds itself listed, maliciously or accidentally, NS8 Protect will alert you and direct you towards a solution.

module.name: ekomiratingsandreviews
module.description: Integrieren Sie Anbieter- und Produktbewertungen von eKomi nahtlos in Ihr PrestaShop-Konto. Vom Shop-Backend aus werden automatisch Rezensionsanfragen ausgelöst
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrieren Sie Anbieter- und Produktbewertungen von eKomi nahtlos in Ihr PrestaShop-Konto. Vom Shop-Backend aus werden automatisch Rezensionsanfragen ausgelöst. Die Produktrezensionen werden automatisch auf den zugehörigen Produktseiten angezeigt.
module.additional_description: eKomi, der führende unabhängige Bewertungsdienst, hat sich auf die Sammlung, Verwaltung und Veröffentlichung von Rezensionen und Bewertungen zu Anbietern und Produkten für Unternehmen spezialisiert. Dank ständiger Innovation und marktführender Technologie können wir Ihnen vielfältige und anpassungsfähige Methoden der Generierung von Rezensionen zur Verfügung stellen, mit denen Sie jeden Ihrer Kunden erreichen können, um proaktiv um dessen Feedback zu bitten. Automatisches Sammeln und Anzeigen authentischer Anbieter- und Produktrezensionen und -bewertungen.Erhöhen Sie das Vertrauen in Ihr Unternehmen und stärken Sie die Kundenbindung, um den Umsatz zu steigern.Aktivieren Sie Ihre Verkäuferbewertungserweiterung, um die Sternebewertungen auf Ihren Google-Anzeigen anzuzeigen, und erhöhen Sie Ihre Klickrate um 17 %.Lenken Sie mehr qualifizierte Zugriffe auf Ihre Website.Regen Sie mit unserer integrierten Couponfunktion weitere Käufe an.Verringern Sie die Retourenquote, indem Sie auf den Produktseiten die entsprechenden Produktbewertungen anzeigen. Insgesamt gilt, dass mit der Zahl der Bewertungen für Ihr Unternehmen auch die Zugriffe auf Ihre Website zunehmen, das Vertrauen Ihrer bestehenden und potenziellen Kunden wächst und Ihr Umsatz und Ihr ROI steigen – starten Sie also noch heute!

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Erleichtern Sie sich Sicherheits- und funktionsbezogene Updates für die Module Ihres Shops und erhalten Sie jede Woche E-Commerce-Tipps, die Ihnen weiterhelfen
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Erleichtern Sie sich Sicherheits- und funktionsbezogene Updates für die Module Ihres Shops und erhalten Sie jede Woche E-Commerce-Tipps, die Ihnen weiterhelfen.
module.additional_description: Sobald Sie mit Ihrem PrestaShop-Addons-Konto über dieses Modul verbunden sind, können Sie:Jede Woche einen E-Commerce-Tipp erhalten; der Tipp bezieht sich auf den E-Commerce-Kalender, Sie finden ihn direkt in Ihrem Dashboard (z. B.: wann und wie sollte man sich auf den Black Friday, den Schulanfang etc. vorbereiten);  Ihren Shop schützen, indem Sie über die neuesten Sicherheitsupdates für die Module, die Sie auf PrestaShop Addons heruntergeladen haben, informiert werden;  Neue Funktionen nutzen, die zu den Modulen, die Sie auf PrestaShop Addons heruntergeladen haben, hinzugefügt werden.

module.name: cobiro
module.description: Start advertising on Google Ads today - free & 100% automated. Cobiro is artificial intelligence for Search & Shopping ads that can be set up in minutes. Signup today and get $100 of free ads
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Start advertising on Google Ads today - free & 100% automated. Cobiro is artificial intelligence for Search & Shopping ads that can be set up in minutes. Signup today and get $100 of free ads. Save up to 25% on your Google Shopping campaigns!
module.additional_description: Turn your products and categories into high quality ads Connect your PrestaShop store to Cobiro, and let us set up automated advertisement on the Google Advertisement Network from your product catalogue. Google AdWords is Google's advertising system where advertisers bid on keywords in order for their clickable ads to appear in Google's search results. Cobiro automates the creation, maintenance and bid management of ads, so you can focus on running your business instead. No matter whether you’re selling products or trying to bring awareness to your services, Cobiro’s got you covered.

module.name: cleverppc
module.description: Create and manage your Google Ads campaigns easily and fast with a Premier Google Partner!With just 5 simple steps your campaigns will be on the Google search network
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Create and manage your Google Ads campaigns easily and fast with a Premier Google Partner!With just 5 simple steps your campaigns will be on the Google search network.Optimize your ROI, we will be your personal Digital Marketing department!
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site.Google Shopping campaigns: Upload your products to the Google Merchant Center and boost your sales. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Adwords app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right costumers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Die Datenschutz-Grundverordnung (DSGVO) tritt am 25
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Die Datenschutz-Grundverordnung (DSGVO) tritt am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft: sorgen Sie dafür, dass Ihr Onlineshop die Anforderungen dieser neuen EU-Verordnung einhält!   Das offizielle Modul zur DSGVO-Compliance wurde vom PrestaShop-Team gemeinsam mit unseren Experten in Sachen DSGVO entwickelt. Nur dieses Modul bietet Ihnen eine umfassende und an Ihre Website angepasste Lösung zur Verarbeitung der mittels PrestaShop und der installierten Module erfassten Daten.*   *Weitere Informationen finden Sie im Abschnitt „Merkmale“ Note: This module is only compatible with PrestaShop 1.7, please click here to find the version for PrestaShop 1.5 & 1.6.
module.additional_description: Was ist die DSGVO?   Die Datenschutz-Grundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine Verordnung der Europäischen Union, mit der die Regeln zur Verarbeitung personenbezogener Daten vereinheitlicht werden. Sie gilt für die automatisierte oder manuelle Verarbeitung personenbezogener Daten (z. B. Erfassung, Aufbewahrung, Extraktion, Nutzung, Löschung usw.).   Personenbezogene Daten sind Angaben über eine bestimmte oder bestimmbare Person (z. B.: Vor-/Nachname, E-Mail-Adresse, IP-Adresse, Telefonnummer usw.).   Vorteile unseres DSGVO-Moduls   Das offizielle Modul zur DSGVO-Compliance von PrestaShop begleitet Sie bei der Erreichung der DSGVO-Konformität Ihres Onlineshops. Es befasst sich mit den wichtigsten Verpflichtungen dieser europäischen Verordnung bezüglich der persönlichen Daten Ihrer Kunden, wie etwa:  Das Recht auf Zugang zu persönlichen Daten sowie das Recht auf DatenportabilitätDas Recht auf Änderung und/oder Löschung der DatenDas Recht, die Einwilligung zu widerrufen, wenn eine Einwilligungserklärung abgegeben wurde  Darüber hinaus können Sie mit dem Modul ein Protokoll über alle Aktivitäten Ihrer Kunden hinsichtlich ihrer persönlichen Daten zu führen (insbesondere in Bezug auf die Zugänglichkeit, die Einwilligung sowie die Löschung von Daten). Auf diese Weise können Sie jederzeit belegen, dass Sie die Verpflichtungen der Verordnung einhalten.

module.name: touchize
module.description: Mobiles Shoppen wird schneller, einfacher und angenehmer mit Drag-2-Buy, gleichzeitig werden Kundentreue und mobile Absätze gesteigert
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mobiles Shoppen wird schneller, einfacher und angenehmer mit Drag-2-Buy, gleichzeitig werden Kundentreue und mobile Absätze gesteigert. Einfache 1-Klick-Installation und 30-Tage-Testversion
module.additional_description: Eine einzigartige mobile Einkaufserfahrung für Ihre KundenDurch Optimierung Ihres Onlineshops mit Drag-2-Buy für Touchscreens auf Handys und Tablets bietet Touchize Commerce Ihren Verbrauchern eine einzigartige mobile Einkaufserfahrung.Kunden können mühelos Produkte durchstöbern und entdecken, mehr über die Varianten erfahren und sie mit einer einfachen Geste dem Warenkorb bei jedem Einkauf hinzufügenDrag-2-Buy erhöht Kundenzufriedenheit und -treue  Ein einfaches Tool zur Steigerung Ihrer mobilen Onlineverkäufe Den Kunden bietet sich eine reibungslose und verständliche mobile Einkaufserfahrung. Es ist wie das Einkaufen in einem herkömmlichen Geschäft. Die Kunden legen das Produkt in den Warenkorb und gehen dann zur Kasse.Die Erfahrung von Touchize Commerce lässt den Kunden eigenständiger werden und steigert die Konversionsraten und die Anzahl der Produkte im Warenkorb an der Kasse (gesteigerter durchschnittlicher Bestellwert/AOV).Sie können schnell interaktive Aktionsbanner hinzufügen, von denen aus Kunden Produkte direkt zum Warenkorb ziehen und dort ablegen können.Sprechen Sie mobile Kunden auf Smartphones und Tablets anVerbessern Sie die BenutzererfahrungSteigern Sie den durchschnittlichen Warenkorbwert  Kostenlose 30-Tage-TestversionRegistrieren Sie sich für eine 30-Tage-Testversion und sehen Sie, wie Ihre Online-Umsätze steigen!
